review_blob:
roasty, spruce, woody aroma
red, cloudy, sparkling, frothy appearance
medium sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour
full body, creamy texture,lively carbonation, 
long finish

Another well made beer, try it when you can, you will enjoy it and probably try it again.

I dont want to get into the details of such a complex beer, but I love this beer, its one of the best beers in the world. Everyone should try it once. It has an amazing flavor, a good texture, nice look and smell.

If you have never tried this beer, I strongly suggest you go out of your way to do so. It is not the best beer in any category, however, I have never found a more drinkable beer. I can drink this any time of the day, with any meal, and if I am in the mood to drink many beers, this would be my only choice. For what it is, its the best of its kind, and I enjoy it with popcorn. Once again, its the most drinkable beer overall that I know of. 
light sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour. medium body, creamy texture, average carbonation, excellent but not overpowering finish.
